process.description: TCP4-2163 Verify Signal Script Task Timer Event and Terminate Event A
process.name: TCP4-2163 Verify Signal Script Task Timer Event and Terminate Event A
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_2" name="StartEvent" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:interstitialScreenRef="" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}" pm:screenRef="">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_6</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_5" name="Terminate Agreement" pm:screenRef="770" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:interstitialScreenRef="" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_37</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_8" name="Action?">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_22</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_14</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" name="" sourceRef="node_5" targetRef="node_8"/>
    <bpmn:scriptTask id="node_36" name="Set Variables" pm:scriptRef="158">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_6</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_37</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:scriptTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_37" name="" sourceRef="node_36" targetRef="node_5"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_16" name="SendEmail">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_14</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:signalEventDefinition signalRef="VerifySignal" pm:config="{"payload":[{"id":"ALL_REQUEST_DATA","variable":"terminate_data","expression":""}]}"/>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:boundaryEvent id="node_4" name="> 10 min" attachedToRef="node_5">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_7</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
        <bpmn:timeDuration>PT24M</bpmn:timeDuration>
      </bpmn:timerEventDefinition>
    </bpmn:boundaryEvent>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_18" name="Canceled Request" pm:screenRef="769">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_22</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_7</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:terminateEventDefinition/>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_22" name="Cancel" sourceRef="node_8" targetRef="node_18">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">buttonSubmit == "CANCEL"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_14" name="" sourceRef="node_8" targetRef="node_16">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression"/>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_6" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_36"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_7" name="" sourceRef="node_4" targetRef="node_18"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:collaboration id="collaboration_0">
    <bpmn:participant id="node_1" name="Terminate Agreement Process" processRef="ProcessId"/>
  </bpmn:collaboration>
  <bpmn:signal id="aaa" name="aaa"/>
  <bpmn:signal id="AAA" name="AAA"/>
  <bpmn:signal id="VerifySignal" name="Verify Signal Script Task Timer Event and Terminate Event"/>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="collaboration_0">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">

      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">

      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <di:waypoint x="738" y="343"/>
        <di:waypoint x="898" y="343"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_36_di" bpmnElement="node_36">

scripts.title: TCP4-2163 Verify Signal Script Task Timer Event and Terminate Event A - Terminate Agreement Get Current Date
scripts.code:
<?php

////---- Get current date
$timestamp = time();
$dt = new DateTime("now", new DateTimeZone('America/Phoenix'));
$dt->setTimestamp($timestamp);
$currentDate = $dt->format('Y-m-d H:i:s');

return [
    'DATE' => $currentDate,
];
?>
